thing-type.label: Da Vinci v9
thing-type.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Da Vinci wall controller is a Multi Chanel Z-Wave device that contains up to 6 relays and up to 9 touch buttons that can be set to control either the relays (On/Off switches and shutters) or any other on/off (SWITCH_BINARY) , shutter (MULTILEVEL_SWITCH) Z-Wave device.</p&gt <p&gtDouble Press the following buttons in the following order 8,1,3. Use the reset procedure only when the primary controller is missing or inoperable.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the #1 button 3 times.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress the #1 button 3 times.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Button 1 Type
parameter.description: button 1 Type<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt1 = switch on/off</p&gt <p&gt2 = blind up</p&gt <p&gt3 = blind down</p&gt <p&gt4 = switch multiway</p&gt <p&gt5 = blind-up multiway</p&gt <p&gt6 = blind-down multiway</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_2
parameter.label: 2: Button 1 Partner-Id
parameter.description: Button 1 Partner-Id<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gtWhen setting Button (EP) to blind, Partner Id EP also change to blind (opposite direction).</li&gt <li&gtBlind must contain Partner Id which is different than 0 and it must be unique. </li&gt <li&gtWhen setting blind to switch, Partner Id also change to switch</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Button 1 attributes
parameter.description: Button 1 attributes<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtBit [0] = LED enable</p&gt <p&gtBit [1] = Sound enable</p&gt <p&gtBit [2] = Dry contact enable</p&gt <p&gtBit [3] = Motor enable</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Button 2 Type
parameter.description: Button 2 Type<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt1 = switch on/off</p&gt <p&gt2 = blind up</p&gt <p&gt3 = blind down</p&gt <p&gt4 = switch multiway</p&gt <p&gt5 = blind-up multiway</p&gt <p&gt6 = blind-down multiway</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.label: 7: Button 2 Partner-Id
parameter.description: Button 2 Partner-Id<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gtWhen setting Button (EP) to blind, Partner Id EP also change to blind (opposite direction).</li&gt <li&gtBlind must contain Partner Id which is different than 0 and it must be unique. </li&gt <li&gtWhen setting blind to switch, Partner Id also change to switch</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_48_1
parameter.label: 48: Device Toggle or Pulse the output
parameter.description: Device Toggle or Pulse the output<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt<strong&gtDevice Toggle or Pulse the output:</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gt0 = Toggle</p&gt <p&gt1 = Pulse</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_49_1
parameter.label: 49: Device Background LEDs Timeout
parameter.description: Device Background LEDs Timeout<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt<strong&gtDevice Background LEDs Timeout:</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gt0 = always Off</p&gt <p&gt10 - 40 = Timeout in seconds</p&gt <p&gt255 = always On!!!!!!!</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_50_1
parameter.label: 50: Device touch sensitivity
parameter.description: Device touch sensitivity<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt<strong&gtYou can choose value between 0 – 7</strong&gt</p&gt <p&gt0 = most sensitive</p&gt <p&gt7 = least sensitive</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_51_1
parameter.label: 51: Save and Reset
parameter.description: Save and Reset<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt255 = save and reset</p&gt</p&gt
